content: Vessels are strong by default, so much so that they can completely change how you approach fights, or get you through hard fights. There are only a few of them in the game, however. Finding Black Myth: Wukong's secrets and killing some of the Black Myth: Wukong secret bosses will lead you to them. They can't be upgraded.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Weaver's_Needle.md', within the main section titled 'Weaver's Needle'.
The content is as follows:
Vessels are strong by default, so much so that they can completely change how you approach fights, or get you through hard fights. There are only a few of them in the game, however. Finding Black Myth: Wukong's secrets and killing some of the Black Myth: Wukong secret bosses will lead you to them. They can't be upgraded.
